name: Recognize
description:
Recognize text from image


How to use

  1. Select an image with text
  2. Select a language
  3. The recognized text appears to the right of the image


Supported language

Arabic

Bulgarian

Chinese

Croatian

Czech

Danish

Dutch

English

Finnish

French

German

Greek

Hungarian

Korean

Italian

Japanese

Polish

Portuguese

Russian

Slovenian

Spanish

Swedish

Turkish
